name: Llamaladie
description:
The CDC have reported a major outbreak of a new viral disease called Llamalaria.

Symptoms include loss of motor skills, lack of coordination, major physical mutations to the head and neck, and an intense psychological need to spread the infection by emitting saliva onto other potential victims.

If you see someone with what appears to be a llama head, be sure to remain calm and avoid contact at all costs.

A game made for GGJ2018 by:

  • Léandre W. Bolduc
  • Isabelle Chamois
  • Anthony Cousineau
  • Elie Henriques
  • Annie-Claude Leblanc
  • Justin Loranger-Ahluwalia
  • Carlyne Poizeau
  • Joeson Yu
